metro.GameScreen.MainView

Class TrackPlacingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.TrackPlacingTool

  • public class TrackPlacingTool
extends GameScreen
    A track placing tool is used by the player to build new tracks for the trains.
    Author:
    hauke

      • createTrack

        private RailwayNode createTrack(int offsetB,
                      int offsetH,
                      int start,
                      int end,
                      RailwayNode prevNode)
        Creates one Track (~ one line) for the parameter.
        Parameters:
        offsetB - Offset for horizontal position.
        offsetH - Offset for vertical position.
        start - Start of counter.
        end - End of counter.
        prevNode - The previous node that should be connected to new ones.
